https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fFS90yjzC1CnEjJRwJxTKgX6Tv7.jpg Baldur is a shy, soft-spoken man and a local legend of his remote valley in Iceland. He has a dream: Meeting his long-lost friend who is living on a distant shore on an Island in the Pacific ocean. Who is Baldur's friend? What magnificent experiences do they share from the past? Bakka-Baldur
